metadata.title: Analysis of CRISPR screen results with casTLE

annotations.description: Screen results were analysed using the casTLE software, a maximum likelihood estimator that provides for each gene a casTLE score, a log-likelihood ratio that considers the relative enrichment or depletion of each gene-targeting sgRNA compared to the distribution of negative control sgRNA effects, and a casTLE effect size (log2-transformed maximum likelihood estimate of the ratio of cells containing sgRNAs targeting a given gene in one sample compared to another, normalized to the median difference of negative control sgRNAs).
